name: 3lob
description:
Play 3lob, a slime who can change form in this hectic puzzle/platformer in 2.5D !

Want to stick to a wall ? Change to Sticky form to stick to the backwall and almost any wall !

Want to jump higher and bounce everywhere ? Change to Bouncy form to bounce on walls and impulse into the air !

Want to be heavy ? Change to Solid form to stomp and destroy fragile walls !

Game made with Unity

This game is made to be played with an XBox-type controller
